original_text: What have you to do here, and whom have you here, that you have cut out here a tomb for yourself, you who cut out a tomb on the height and carve a dwelling for yourself in the rock?
korean_text: 네가 여기와 무슨 관계가 있느냐 여기에 누가 있기에 여기서 너를 위하여 묘실을 팠느냐 높은 곳에 자기를 위하여 묘실을 팠고 반석에 자기를 위하여 처소를 쪼아내었도다

sentences.original_text: What have you to do here,
that you have cut out here a tomb for yourself,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너 자신을 위해 여기에 무덤을 파냈다는 말이냐,

sentences.original_text: you who cut out a tomb on the height
and carve a dwelling for yourself in the rock?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 반석에 너를 위한 거처를 새기느냐?
